name: @mfl/block-device-listener
description: Listens for block device add / removes. Writes to device-scanner-daemon socket.

scripts.prepublish: old_pwd=$PWD; cd ../../; dotnet fable npm-run rollup --args "-i $old_pwd/lib/main.fs -o $old_pwd/$npm_package_main" --port 'free'; chmod +x $old_pwd/$npm_package_main

author: MFL Team
